### Importing Libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

#ggsave("__") - Saves Png file
# write_csv(dataframe, "dir/file.csv"); - Saves csv file
```

### Projects

- To keep R scripts as the source of truth for analyses, instruct RStudio to NOT preserve your workspace betwen sessions. `uses_blank_slate()`
- Use `getwd()` to get working directory. 

### Reading files:

```{r}
# students <- read_csv("file.csv")
```
